SummaryEnglish: A superhero-loving boy without any powers is determined to enroll in a prestigious hero academy and learn what it really means to be a hero.

1.SummaryEnglish: Four weeks after the League of Villains' attempt to assassinate All Might, the students of Class 1-A return to USJ to complete their disaster training. However, unbeknownst to the heroes-in-training, an unexpected foe is lurking within the facility's walls and waiting to strike...

2.SummaryEnglish: Recap of My Hero Academia's first season, aired a week before the second season.

3.SummaryEnglish: Story about a joint practice session between Izuku's class and Isami High students at U. A. Academy, takes place after the field training arc in the second season.

4.TitleEnglish: My Hero Academia: The Two Heroes
4.SummaryEnglish: The climactic finals are over, and U.A. is getting ready for the summer training camp. Deku and All Might receive an invitation from a certain person to go overseas to a giant artificial moving city called I-Island. This island, a kind of “science Hollywood” that gathers the knowledge of scientists from around the world, is holding an exhibition called I-Expo showcasing the results of Quirk and hero item research. In the midst of all this, Deku meets a Quirkless girl named Melissa and remembers his own Quirkless past. Out of the blue, the impregnable security system the island boasts is hacked by villains, and all the people on the island are taken as hostages! Now, a plan that could shake hero society has been put into motion! The man who holds the key to it all is the number one hero and Symbol of Peace, All Might.

5.SummaryEnglish: Young All Might sees his mentor, Nana Shimura, be defeated by All For One.

6.SummaryEnglish: It's the day after the incident at I-Island, Deku & All Might discuss the future of David & Melissa. On the other hand, All Might's has planned a BBQ for all the members of Class 1A.

7.SummaryEnglish: Deku and the rest of the heroes of Class 1-A must save a group of islanders from Nine, the strongest villain yet.

8.TitleEnglish: Make It! Do-or-Die Survival Training, Part 1
8.SummaryEnglish: UA's sophomore students are undergoing targeted training to prepare for their provisional license exams, and today they will have to take part in a rescue operation. This is just a simulation, but teamwork will be required in order to succeed in the exercise. Except that as soon as the mission begins, a landslide changes the game. The ten students who had split into several groups find themselves trapped by debris. Is this accident part of the exercise? Will the students come out of it unharmed? The survival test has just begun.

9.TitleEnglish: Make It! Do-or-Die Survival Training, Part 2
9.SummaryEnglish: In preparation for the provisional license exam, UA's 10th grade students are participating in a simulated rescue, but the rescue has gone wrong and the students are now trapped in an underground shopping mall. As if the situation wasn't complicated enough, water starts seeping through the walls. The students have to get out of here as soon as possible. That said, Bakugo still takes the mission very seriously and refuses to go out without finding and evacuating the rescue dummy. The water is rising dangerously. Will they be able to evacuate and avoid the disaster?

10.TitleEnglish: My Hero Academia: Heroes Rising - Epilogue Plus
10.SummaryEnglish: A picture drama epilogue to the film My Hero Academia: Heroes Rising, bundled with the BD/DVD release.

11.TitleEnglish: My Hero Academia: World Heroes' Mission
11.SummaryEnglish: A mysterious group called Humarize strongly believes in the Quirk Singularity Doomsday theory which states that when quirks get mixed further in with future generations, that power will bring forth the end of humanity. In order to save everyone, the Pro-Heroes around the world ask UA Academy heroes-in-training to assist them and form a world-classic selected hero team. It is up to the heroes to save the world and the future of heroes in what is the most dangerous crisis to take place yet in My Hero Academia.

12.TitleEnglish: My Hero Academia: World Heroes' Mission - Take-off
12.SummaryEnglish: Adaptation of "No.XXX Hawks: SOOTHE" side-chapter in the Volume World Heroes manga. Included in the "Plus Ultra" version of the film's Blu-ray and DVD release in Japan.

13.SummaryEnglish: HLB stands for “Hero League of Baseball” - it is a baseball league founded by pro-heroes who love baseball! It’s game day! The last game of HLB championship is between Gang Orca and Shishido's two rival agencies. They form a team (“Orcas” and “Lionels”) to compete. In the world of HLB, there is no rule – using their quirks is of course accepted. However, just when the game is about to finish, they are interrupted by a villain. Who will be the winner of HLB!?

14.TitleEnglish: Laugh! As If You Are in Hell
14.SummaryEnglish: Deku, Bakugo, and Todoroki participate in internship under the No.1 hero, Endeavor's agency. One of their tasks these days is to find a villain (“Smiley”) who draws doodles in the city. However, since the urgency is so low, they let other pro-heroes solve this case. One day, Smiley draws a doodle on Endeavor’s house! Being furious, Endeavor himself and the 1-A trio go out to get the villain. However, Smiley’s quirk turns out to be something ridiculous but powerful... It is to make anyone who looks into his eyes laugh hysterically! Can the team capture the villain and stop laughing!?

15.SummaryEnglish: Class 1-A are bored out of their minds! Stuck in their dorms during the winter season, they can't go out or do anything fun. That is until third year Mirio Togata pays the students a visit with a new card game the support course developed that uses U.A. students as playable characters. Now to pass the time, they'll play this game that's just as tough as U.A. Who will win the card battle?!

16.SummaryEnglish: After the Quirkless Izuku Midoriya meets All Might, he becomes the successor to All Might's Quirk, One For All, which means he must eventually go up against All For One and Tomura Shigaraki.

17.SummaryEnglish: All Might's last fight against All For One set off a series of events leading to his retirement as a hero, but he continues to fight, even as the embers of One For All within him die out.

18.SummaryEnglish: Ochaco and the Todoroki family think back about why they are fighting and reconfirm their convictions as they continue to face off against the villains.

19.SummaryEnglish: When Tomura Shigaraki was a child, a tragic accident led to the death of his family, which continues to fuel his desire to destroy.

20.SummaryEnglish: In a society devastated by the effects of an all-out war between heroes and villains, a mysterious giant fortress suddenly appears, engulfing towns and people one after another. Then, a man reminiscent of All Might, the 'symbol of peace', stands in front of Izuku and his friends...

1.SummaryEnglish: Izuku Midoriya desperately wants to be a hero, but he is one of the few in his generation born without a Quirk. Will meeting the number one hero, All Might, change his fate?

2.TitleEnglish: What It Takes to Be a Hero
2.SummaryEnglish: Izuku accidentally learns of All Might's secret, but there's trouble in town again before Izuku has time to process it. Will All Might be able to save the day again?

3.SummaryEnglish: All Might tells Izuku that he can become a hero, but does he really have what it takes to become one?

4.SummaryEnglish: At the entrance exam, Izuku falls behind as the other students defeat faux villains left and right. Will he be able to get enough points to pass?

5.TitleEnglish: What I Can Do for Now
5.SummaryEnglish: It's Izuku's first day of high school, and he still can't control his new Quirk. Will he make it to the second day of school with his eccentric new teacher?

6.SummaryEnglish: Izuku somehow gets through his first day of school and falls into a regular schedule of classes and training at U.A. In their first class with All Might...

7.SummaryEnglish: In All Might's first class, Izuku will have to face off against Katsuki! As the hero team, can Izuku and Uraraka beat the villain team of Katsuki and Tenya?

8.SummaryEnglish: After the combat training lesson, the students and All Might reflect on their matches as they think about their next steps.

9.TitleEnglish: Yeah, Just Do Your Best, Iida!
9.SummaryEnglish: Class 1-A has to elect a class representative, and everyone wants the job! How will they choose? And what lies in wait for them at the next class?

10.SummaryEnglish: Villains have attacked USJ, and it's up to Class 1-A to stop them. What are the villains after? Will All Might be able to save the day again?

11.SummaryEnglish: The students fight for their lives against the Villains while Iida manages to escape with his friends' help. Once knowing that Iida will warn the other teachers who will come to stop them, the Villains' leader Tomura Shigaraki decides to kill Izuku and his friends just to hurt All Might's pride before they leave, when All Might himself appears.

12.SummaryEnglish: All Might has finally shown up, but will he be able to defeat Nomu and save the day?!

13.SummaryEnglish: As the battle at USJ winds down, Izuku and All Might think about its repercussions. Meanwhile, the villains slink home to plan their next move.

1.SummaryEnglish: As U.A. students and teachers recover from the League of Villains attack on USJ, Izuku learns about why Ochaco wants to become a hero.

2.SummaryEnglish: The U.A. sports festival begins and all eyes are on the first-years as they start their qualifying round—the obstacle course race.

3.SummaryEnglish: The first-years try to stand out as they struggle to finish the obstacle course and qualify for a spot in the next round.

4.SummaryEnglish: Izuku's having trouble finding a team for the cavalry battle in the next round of the U.A. sports festival. Luckily, he has a plan.

5.SummaryEnglish: The teams are fighting it out in the second half of the cavalry battle. Will Team Midoriya be able to keep their place in the top four?

6.SummaryEnglish: Izuku learns more about Todoroki's past as the first-years head into the final round of the sports festival.

7.SummaryEnglish: Izuku is up against Shinso in the first match of the finals, but how will he overcome Shinso's Quirk to advance to the next round?

8.SummaryEnglish: It's one match after another in the first round of the finals tournament. Who will advance to the second round?

9.SummaryEnglish: Bakugo seems almost villainous when he's up against Uraraka, but she has a plan to keep it from being a one-sided match.

10.SummaryEnglish: Izuku forces Todoroki to face his past in a chilling battle as the two class rivals finally go head to head!

11.SummaryEnglish: It’s class rep versus child prodigy as Iida and Todoroki square off. Will Iida's Reciproburst be enough to beat the boy of fire and ice?

12.SummaryEnglish: The explosive showdown between Todoroki and Bakugo begins. Only one can take the title of first-year champion!

13.SummaryEnglish: Following their epic debut at the sports festival, it’s time for the first-years to pick the most important part of their identities—their hero name!

14.SummaryEnglish: The internships begin! While everyone adjusts to their new tasks, Izuku starts training with Gran Torino, the same man who once taught All Might.

15.SummaryEnglish: The U.A. students are finally starting to get the hang of their internships, but Izuku has much more to learn about One For All.

16.TitleEnglish: Hero Killer: Stain vs. U.A. Students
16.SummaryEnglish: Stain strikes again, and this time some U.A. students are around when it happens. Will they be able to hold him off until the pros come?

17.SummaryEnglish: It all comes to a head as Izuku, Iida, and Todoroki face off against Stain while the pro heroes in Hosu City fight against the Nomus.

18.TitleEnglish: The Aftermath of Hero Killer: Stain
18.SummaryEnglish: Stain is finally captured, but now the hero community must deal with the consequences of their actions.

19.SummaryEnglish: As Izuku, Iida, and Todoroki recover from their fight with Stain, the other members of Class 1-A work hard at their own internships.

20.TitleEnglish: Listen Up!! A Tale from the Past
20.SummaryEnglish: The students return to their daily lives while All Might has a special history lesson for Izuku. It’s time to learn about One For All!

21.SummaryEnglish: Finals are coming up and Class 1-A is going to need more than a cram session. This year, the teachers are changing the practical exams.

22.SummaryEnglish: The exams are turning out to be much more challenging than the students expected. Can any of the teams hold their own against a teacher?

23.SummaryEnglish: As the students of Class 1-A fight in their practical exams, their resolve to become heroes is put to the test.

24.SummaryEnglish: It's finally time for Izuku and Bakugo's practical exam. How can they challenge All Might without a plan?

25.SummaryEnglish: Class 1-A goes shopping for training camp supplies, but things get out of hand when a villain pulls Izuku aside.

1.SummaryEnglish: Before the U.A. students head to their training camp, Class 1-A goes to the pool for extra training, and the League of Villains plots their next move.

2.SummaryEnglish: Class 1-A faces the first challenge of their summer training camp when they have to fight their way through "The Beast's Forest" before lunch.

3.SummaryEnglish: Midoriya tries to talk with Kota as the first-years start their training in earnest. Little do they know what awaits them in the forest.

4.SummaryEnglish: The villains launch their attack, and only Izuku knows where Kota is. Can he get to him in time?

5.SummaryEnglish: Izuku finally makes it back to the training camp only to leave again with a message for Mandalay to broadcast.

6.SummaryEnglish: Students and teachers of UJS are still fighting in the woods, but the Vanguard avant-garde team has already accomplished its mission ...?!

7.SummaryEnglish: The battle at the training camp concludes, and now the students and teachers of U.A. have to deal with the aftermath.

8.SummaryEnglish: Todoroki, Kirishima, and Midoriya want to go after Bakugo, but the class rep is standing in their way. Meanwhile, Shigaraki makes Bakugo an offer…

9.SummaryEnglish: The heroes and U.A. students close in on the League of Villains' hideouts, but the League still has an ace up its sleeve…

10.SummaryEnglish: As the fight against the League of Villains escalates, can the U.A. students get Bakugo out in time for All Might to make a big comeback?

11.SummaryEnglish: All Might's time is running out as he faces his ultimate nemesis head on. Will he finally be able to defeat All For One once and for all?

12.TitleEnglish: End of the Beginning, Beginning of the End
12.SummaryEnglish: After All Might and All For One's fight, the students go back home while the U.A. teachers decide how to deal with the aftermath.

13.SummaryEnglish: The students of Class 1-A move into the dorms and have a competition to determine who has the best room as they settle in.

14.SummaryEnglish: Class 1-A works on developing their Quirks and creating ultimate moves in order to get ready for the provisional hero licensing exam.

15.SummaryEnglish: Izuku and his classmates make some final adjustments to their ultimate moves and then head off to the provisional licensing exam.

16.SummaryEnglish: The provisional licensing exam has begun, and everyone's after Class 1-A! Can they last long enough to pass this first test?

17.SummaryEnglish: Todoroki's on his own against Seijin High, and Yaoyorozu's group is pitted against Seiai Academy as they and the rest of Class 1-A fight to pass the first test.

18.SummaryEnglish: It's down to the final minutes of the first test of the provisional licensing exam and almost half of Class A is still left…

19.SummaryEnglish: The second test of the provisional licensing exam has begun, and the hero candidates are suddenly thrust into a rescue operation.

20.TitleEnglish: Special Episode - Save the World with Love!
20.SummaryEnglish: We take a break from the provisional licensing exam to visit a class held before the summer training camp!

21.SummaryEnglish: The exam nears its end, but Izuku and the other hero candidates must fend off Gang Orca to finish the rescue mission.

22.SummaryEnglish: While the U.A. students finish up the provisional licensing exam and get their results, All Might has a talk with All For One.

23.SummaryEnglish: Following the provisional licensing exam, Izuku tries out his Shoot Style on Bakugo as they have a heart-to-heart through their fight.

24.SummaryEnglish: The world has changed for villains and heroes alike in the weeks after All Might's fight with All For One, and the U.A. students start their second semester.

25.SummaryEnglish: The students of Class 1-A learn about work studies from the Big Three. Meanwhile, the villains also prepare their next steps.

1.SummaryEnglish: After All Might announces his retirement, freelance reporter Taneo Tokuda goes to the dorms to investigate U.A. Class 1-A.

2.SummaryEnglish: Overhaul pays a visit to the League of Villains, and Midoriya tries to find a place to do his work study.

3.SummaryEnglish: Izuku battles Sir Nighteye so he can do his work study at Nighteye's agency, but Nighteye has someone else in mind to be All Might's successor...

4.SummaryEnglish: Izuku's mind is swirling with feelings from his work study, so he goes and talks to All Might about it and learns about All Might's fate.

5.SummaryEnglish: The U.A. work study students go out with their respective heroes and become involved in some big fights.

6.SummaryEnglish: The work study students from U.A. attend a meeting of heroes gathered by Sir Nighteye and leave with new resolve.

7.SummaryEnglish: The work study students wait until the pro heroes find Eri and it's time to start the operation to save her.

8.SummaryEnglish: The Shie Hassaikai is going all out to stop the heroes, and Suneater volunteers to take out the first batch of Eight Bullets members in their way.

9.SummaryEnglish: As the fight with the Shie Hassaikai continues, Kirishima has to face his past when he and Fat Gum get separated from the others.

10.SummaryEnglish: The Hassaikai gets some help from the League of Villains as the heroes continue to make their way to Chisaki to rescue Eri.

11.SummaryEnglish: The League of Villains stay true to their name in their fight. Meanwhile, Togata catches up to Chisaki and Eri first...

12.SummaryEnglish: Izuku, Eraser Head, and Sir Nighteye finally reach the area where Chisaki and the others are and find Togata past his limit...

13.SummaryEnglish: As the fight with the Shie Hassaikai reaches its climax, Chisaki looks back on how it all started, and Izuku uses All For One at 100%.

14.SummaryEnglish: As the heroes deal with the aftermath of the fight with the Shie Hassaikai, the vehicle transporting Chisaki has an encounter with the League of Villains...

15.SummaryEnglish: After the fight with the Shie Hassaikai, a new villain emerges, and the students who participated reflect on their own roles as future heroes.

16.SummaryEnglish: Camie joins the provisional license training course and is added to the team working with the kids from Masegaki. Meanwhile, Endeavor has a serious talk with All Might. l

17.SummaryEnglish: The trainees bond with the precocious Masegaki kids and life at U.A. goes back to normal as autumn approaches, but Aoyama has been acting strangely...

18.SummaryEnglish: Class 1-A needs to decide what they want to do for the upcoming school festival, and Midoriya and Togata pay Eri a visit at the hospital.

19.TitleEnglish: Prepping for the School Festival Is the Funnest Part
19.SummaryEnglish: Class 1-A assigns roles for their performance at the school festival, and Gentle starts preparing his next plan.

20.SummaryEnglish: Eri visits U.A. while the students are preparing for the school festival, and Gentle finalizes his plans.

21.SummaryEnglish: As Deku buys some last-minute supplies for the school festival, he encounters a mysterious man wrapped in a trench coat...

22.SummaryEnglish: Izuku must stop Gentle Criminal and his partner, La Brava, or else the school festival will be cancelled.

23.SummaryEnglish: Izuku rushes back to the school festival after his encounter with Gentle Criminal and La Brava, but will he make it in time for his performance?

24.SummaryEnglish: It's time for the next Japanese Hero Billboard Chart rankings to be announced, and this time, all the top ten heroes make an appearance.

25.SummaryEnglish: Endeavor and Hawks are up against High-End, and it's Endeavor's chance to show the world what the new number one hero is like.

1.SummaryEnglish: There's an emergency drill at U.A. High School, and Class 1-A is requested to report for duty!

2.SummaryEnglish: After their fight with the Nomu, Hawks and Endeavor return to daily life, and Izuku dreams of One For All...

3.TitleEnglish: Clash! Class A vs. Class B!
3.SummaryEnglish: Class A and Class B are joined by a special guest as they battle it out during their joint combat training.

4.SummaryEnglish: The Class A team tries to put Shinso and his new equipment to good use in the first match against Class B.

5.SummaryEnglish: It's darkness versus darkness as Tokoyami and Kuroiro face off in the second match of the class battles!

6.SummaryEnglish: Separated from her team, Yaoyorozu's leadership skills are put to the test in the second match of the class battles.

7.SummaryEnglish: In the third match of the class battles, Honenuki leads the Class B team against a well-balanced Class A team.

8.SummaryEnglish: It's still anybody's game as the the third match continues with an endurance battle between Todoroki and Tetsutetsu.

9.SummaryEnglish: Bakugo shows a different side of himself in the fourth team match as the class battles continue.

10.SummaryEnglish: Midoriya and Shinso face off for the first time since the sports festival in the last fight of the class battles.

11.SummaryEnglish: It's an all-out brawl as the last two teams from Class A and Class B fight it out to the finish!

12.TitleEnglish: The New Power and All For One
12.SummaryEnglish: As the class battles conclude, Midoriya works with All Might and Bakugo on learning more about his new power.

13.SummaryEnglish: It's Christmas at U.A. and the Class 1-A students celebrate with a Christmas party.

14.SummaryEnglish: Hawks acts strange when he meets Endeavor and his work study students on their way to Endeavor Agency.

15.SummaryEnglish: As the villains continue to move behind the scenes, Endeavor helps his work study students with the next steps in their training.

16.SummaryEnglish: Ryukyu brings her work study students with her when Selkie asks her to team up with him.

17.SummaryEnglish: Endeavor brings his work study students over for dinner at Fuyumi's request but faces awkward conversations at home.

18.SummaryEnglish: One of Endeavor's biggest fans shows up to settle some unfinished business, and he expects far more than an autograph.

19.TitleEnglish: More of a Hero Than Anyone
19.SummaryEnglish: When an unsettling discovery is made regarding Kurogiri, Aizawa and Present Mic are summoned to interrogate him.

20.SummaryEnglish: A series of surprise encounters helps give Shigaraki a new sense of direction for the League of Villains.

21.SummaryEnglish: The League of Villains waits for Gigantomachia to wake up as they clash with the Meta Liberation Army.

22.SummaryEnglish: As Twice tries to save Toga, he thinks back on his past and makes a realization that helps him overcome it.

23.SummaryEnglish: Memories from Shigaraki's past as Tenko Shimura resurface as he confronts Re-Destro.

24.SummaryEnglish: Shigaraki remembers his first encounter with All For One during the climax of his battle with Re-Destro.

25.SummaryEnglish: Both sides prepare for the confrontation between the heroes and the Paranormal Liberation Front as Class 1-A finishes their first year of high school.

1.SummaryEnglish: Using the information Hawks gathered, the heroes and their work study students get ready for an attack on the Paranormal Liberation Front led by Shigaraki.

2.SummaryEnglish: Mirko chases after Garaki while the rest of Team Endeavor deals with Nomus at Jaku Hospital. Meanwhile, Team Edge Shot charges in for a surprise attack at Gunga Villa.

3.SummaryEnglish: Inside Gunga Villa, the Paranormal Liberation Front realizes that they are under attack, and Twice confronts Hawks about his betrayal.

4.SummaryEnglish: Hawks's confrontation with Dabi leads him to think back on his past. Meanwhile, at the hospital, Mirko fights her way through multiple High Ends to get to Doctor and Shigaraki.

5.SummaryEnglish: After reinforcements finally arrive, the tide is just starting to turn in the heroes' favor when Shigaraki wakes up.

6.SummaryEnglish: As Endeavor tells his team that he's fighting Shigaraki, Midoriya realizes that Shigaraki is after One For All and uses himself as bait to try to lure Shigaraki away from the civilians.

7.SummaryEnglish: The heroes watch helplessly as Nomus emerge from the underground to participate in the battle. Meanwhile, Shigaraki realizes that Aizawa is using his Erasure quirk to deny him access to his Decay, and Gigantomachia moves to be with Tomura as soon as possible.

8.TitleEnglish: League of Villains vs. U.A. Students
8.SummaryEnglish: Momo and the other U.A. students rise up together and confront the sentient mountain that is Gigantomachia, as he eagerly moves towards his master Shigaraki.

9.SummaryEnglish: The battle against Shigaraki and his arsenal of Quirks intensifies, as Bakugo considers his future and the true cost of heroism.

10.SummaryEnglish: Midoriya and Shigaraki enter the world of One For All as Gigantomachia continues north and Toga makes a detour.

11.SummaryEnglish: As Ochaco and Toga exchange words and blows, Gigantomachia reaches Shigaraki and the heroes, and Dabi reveals the secret of his past.

12.SummaryEnglish: Best Jeanist appears and spins together the hopes of all the heroes in this fight as the climax of the all-out war draws near.

13.SummaryEnglish: Thinking of his great-great-grandfather, Mr. Compress performs his greatest trick in order to save the League of Villains.

14.SummaryEnglish: The heroes wrestle with changing public opinion as they deal with the aftermath of the fierce battle and mourn those they lost in the fight.

15.SummaryEnglish: Under All For One's control, Shigaraki attacks Tartarus with the Nomus to free All For One's body, freeing many other prisoners in the process.

16.SummaryEnglish: As heroes deal with criticism from the public, Hawks thinks back on his past with his family, and Endeavor's family visits him in the hospital.

17.TitleEnglish: The Wrong Way to Put Out a Fire
17.SummaryEnglish: Endeavor and his family reflect on Toya's past and the events that led to his death, and Hawks and Best Jeanist bring them a proposition.

18.SummaryEnglish: Inside One For All, Izuku talks with the past wielders as the top three heroes deal with public sentiment after Dabi's revelation.

19.SummaryEnglish: After Izuku decides not to go back to U.A., he finds himself facing Muscular, who was broken out of jail, again and uses the Quirks of the past wielders against him.

20.SummaryEnglish: The top three heroes continue to face criticism as they deal with jailbreakers and look for hints about All For One and Shigaraki's whereabouts, and Izuku comes across a villain from Tartarus.

21.SummaryEnglish: During Izuku's fight with Lady Nagant, she tells him secrets about hero society that further solidify his resolve to help those who need his help.

22.SummaryEnglish: As Izuku goes off alone in his quest for justice, his classmates realize something is wrong and try to find a way to help him.

23.SummaryEnglish: As Deku tries to run away, Class A draws him back by recounting their memories with him and reminding him of his own words.

24.SummaryEnglish: As the evacuees at U.A. voice their dissent, Ochaco speaks up to try and sway them. Onlookers with ties to Izuku try to figure out if it's time for them to speak out, too.

25.SummaryEnglish: As Izuku tries to rest and recover back at U.A. with his classmates, All Might has an encounter with Stain that leads to new information about Shigaraki and All For One.

1.TitleEnglish: In the Nick of Time! A Big-Time Maverick From the West
1.SummaryEnglish: As jailbreakers run rampant in Japan, Star and Stripe flies from the U.S. to Japan to help and finds Shigaraki waiting for her in the middle of her flight path.

2.SummaryEnglish: The fight between Star and Stripe and Shigaraki is coming to an end, but Star has one more trick up her sleeve with New Order.

3.SummaryEnglish: After failing to steal Star's Quirk, New Order, and losing many other Quirks, Shigaraki and All For One prepare for their next move. Who is the traitor at U.A.?!

4.TitleEnglish: The Story of How We All Became Heroes
4.SummaryEnglish: Due to his relationship with All For One, Yuga Aoyama calls himself a villain, but Deku tells him that he can still be a hero and reaches a hand out to him.

5.SummaryEnglish: As heroes and villains get ready for the coming battle, Deku and the others leave U.A., and Deku is called out by Aoyama, who is supposed to be in a police cell. What does Aoyama want?

6.SummaryEnglish: It's finally time for the decisive battle between heroes and villains! The plan by All Might, Aizawa, and the others has them start their fights in various places around Japan!

7.SummaryEnglish: Even though Shigaraki's Quirks are sealed, he attacks Bakugo and the others with a strange new appearance and power. Meanwhile, Deku is pulled to where Toga was warped and Todoroki and Dabi face off!

8.SummaryEnglish: Eleven years ago, Toya Todoroki was burned by his own flames and became Dabi. Todoroki faces Dabi's blue flames with a new move of his own. Will he be able to stop his brother...?

9.SummaryEnglish: Shoto Todoroki stopped Dabi with his Great Glacial Aegir, and reports of that bolstered the spirits of the heroes fighting in other locations. And Shoto and Dabi's father, Endeavor, is facing the greatest evil, All For One, with Hawks!

10.TitleEnglish: Wounded Hero, Burning Bright and True!!
10.SummaryEnglish: Before the threat of All For One, Endeavor falls, and Hawks, Jiro, and Tokoyami are also cornered. Even so, Jiro acts like a hero! Endeavor is also encouraged after looking back at his own life.

11.SummaryEnglish: Bakugo's Howitzer Impact didn't work against Shigaraki/All For One, either, and Bakugo is pushed into a corner by Shigaraki's power and words. In order to get him out of that predicament, U.A.'s Big Three take a stand!

12.TitleEnglish: Those Who Defend, Those Who Violate
12.SummaryEnglish: Bakugo surprised Shigaraki/All For One with Cluster but was then cruelly pierced through. The heroes in all the different locations are getting pushed back... But even so, they will not give up!

13.TitleEnglish: A Chain of Events, Across the Ages
13.SummaryEnglish: Deku finally arrives at the Coffin in the Sky! Seeing Bakugo and the others defeated by Shigaraki/All For One, Deku shakes with anger. Can he control his feelings and win against Shigaraki? It's finally time for a showdown!

14.SummaryEnglish: Spinner takes heteromorphs who are exploding with resentment from being persecuted to Central Hospital to get Kurogiri back. Shoji, whose Quirk also makes him a heteromorph, shouts his feelings to them.

15.SummaryEnglish: Spinner and Present Mic both yell their hearts out. Will the one waking up to their voices be Kurogiri, or Shirakumo? Meanwhile, fighting Ochaco and the others on Okuto Island, Toga is finally going to use her secret weapon...!

16.SummaryEnglish: Toga consumed Twice's blood, and with Kurogiri's Warp, infinite doubles of Twice appear. Shigaraki's Decay is also released, and the heroes seem to be in a state of despair. But then, help comes from an unexpected quarter...

17.SummaryEnglish: With the addition of Gentle, La Brava, and Lady Nagant, Deku is able to restrain Shigaraki's hands and confront him on the ground. Meanwhile, at the Gunga Villa site, the rewound All For One shows off his awful power...

18.SummaryEnglish: Shishikura and the other members of Shiketsu High join the fight at the Gunga Villa site, and it's do-or-die as the heroes unite to fight back! But as All For One gets younger, he gets stronger. That's when unexpected backup arrives...!

19.SummaryEnglish: Trampling the heroes, All For One flies to become one with Shigaraki, and Dabi is about to explode with the heat he's been storing up in his body. Will the Symbol be able change this hopeless situation?

20.SummaryEnglish: Toga transforms into Twice and backs the heroes into a corner with Infinite Doubles. In the midst of that, Ochaco does her best to get close to Toga to talk to her. How does Toga respond...?

21.SummaryEnglish: Toga returns the smile of Ochaco, who tried to be friends with her. What does Toga do to the seriously-injured Ochaco? Meanwhile, All Might uses "power" developed by a friend to face All For One!
